title: Gather Requirements
description: Conduct interviews and workshops with stakeholders to understand the organization's structure, roles, and career paths.

title: Define Data Model
description: Design the data model to represent the organization's structure, roles, career paths, and their relationships. Consider factors such as scalability, performance, ease of querying, and data integrity constraints.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend logic to manage and retrieve the career path data.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Design and implement the user interface for visualizing and exploring career paths.

title: Implement Security
description: Ensure data privacy and access control for sensitive career path information. This includes implementing authentication and authorization mechanisms using industry-standard protocols like OAuth 2.0 and JSON Web Tokens (JWT), data encryption at rest and in transit using strong ciphers like AES-256, secure communication protocols like HTTPS with up-to-date TLS versions, regular security audits and vulnerability assessments using automated tools and manual penetration testing, and secure coding practices like input validation, output encoding, and protection against common web vulnerabilities like XSS, CSRF, and SQL injection.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and execute testing for the application's functionality and usability.

title: Documentation
description: Create user guides and technical documentation for the application.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and automate the deployment process for the application.
